Author: Peter Selch Dahl - Azure MVP
Summary: Demonstrates stopping all Microsoft Azure Virtual Machine in a specific Azure subscription. The script could be associated with the new Azure Automation Scheduler to stop Virtual Machines at specific time. Great for developers for saving on Azure Compute, if they forget to shut
Title: Stop Azure Virtual Machine using Azure Automation Runbook
UserTags: Powershell, Automation, Windows Azure Virtual Machines
